lines.text: Whoa. What happened?
It crumpled the landing gear when we hit.
Well, aren't you gonna fix it? I mean can't we, can't we reattach it somehow?
Sure, we'll, like, glue it back on.
Aren't you one of those guys?
What guys?
Those guy guys, you know, those guys with skills.
Skills?
Yeah. You send them into the wilderness with a pocket knife and a Q-tip and they build you a shopping mall. You can't do that?
[Pops finger out of the side of his mouth]
Does that help?
Quinny, look what I got,
What's that, baby?
It's a bathing suit, silly.
I thought it was an eye patch.
What are you looking at?
Nothing.
Something.
Nothing.
Oh, don't give me that, you were ogling.
Ogling? Let me ask you something. When you go into a department store to buy something like that what do you say to the clerk 'give me that outfit so no one will look at me?'
No, I like people looking - just not you.
If it makes you feel any better you're not my type.
Oh good, why?
Why?
Yeah, you know, I'm making conversation. Why?
You talk too much. You're opinionated. You're stubborn, sarcastic, and stuck up! Your ass is too narrow and your tits are too small.
Hey, you wanna know why you're not my type?
Nope.
I've flown with you twice and you've crashed half the time.

[after using their only flare and hitting a palm tree with it]
Oh no! Oh uh oh! Oh nuts!

[waking up still partly drunk]
What the...? What the hell did you do? You wasted our only god damned flare to shoot a god damned palm tree?
I wouldn't have shot the god damned tree if you hadn't rolled into me. I was trying to signal the god damned plane.
What god damned plane?

[points to a commercial airliner in the sky]
That god damned plane.
That god damned plane? That's a commercial airliner! It's 5 miles high going six hundred miles an hour. They wouldn't see a nuclear explosion if they were looking for it, much less a flare!
How the hell was I supposed to know that? If you hadn't drunken yourself into a coma maybe you could have told me that.
You know what you've done? You know what you've done? You've taken our one good chance of being found and pissed it away!
Don't you dare blame this on me. If you were half a pilot, we WOULDN'T BE ON THIS ISLAND!
I am the best god damned pilot you'll ever meet!
Hah! I've flown with you twice, you've crashed half the time.

[Walks away, leaving Quinn confused at her logic, does a double take]
And there is nothing wrong with my tits!
Ever since we've been here you've been so confident.
Well I'm the captain. That's my job. It's no good for me to go waving my arms in the air and screaming "Oh shit, we're gonna die!" That doesn't invoke much confidence, does it?
I am so scared.
If it makes you feel any better, I'm a little scared myself.
Uh, no. No, that does not make me feel better.
I thought that's what women wanted.
What?
Men who weren't afraid to cry, who were in touch with their feminine side.
No, not when they're being chased by pirates, they like 'em mean and armed!
You deserve someone... fresher.
Isn't that up to me to decide?
Let's be reasonable about this. You're not gonna come down here and be my co-pilot and I'm not gonna go to New York and be your receptionist. Let's not complicate things.
Oh, I forgot, you like things simple.
Yeah.
They come here looking for the magic, hoping to find romance, when they can't find it anywhere else.
Maybe they will.
It's an island, babe. If you didn't bring it here, you won't find it here.
How do you want it?
Excuse me?
Do you want it sugar-coated, or right between the eyes?
You Pick.

We got no landing gear, so we can't take off. Lightning fried the radio, so we can't call for help. AirSea with try a rescue mission but without a beacon to hone in on it's like trying to find a flea on an elephant's ass. The only thing we got is this flare gun with a single flare.
Is it too late to get it sugar coated?
That was sugar-coated.
You know how a woman gets a man excited? She shows up. That's it. We're guys, we're easy. Of course for that you can't charge six bucks an issue, now can you?
I'm the best god damned pilot you'll ever get.
Hah! I've flown with you twice, you've crashed half the time!
[She turns around]
And there is nothing wrong with my tits.

[staring down a sheer cliff]
Oh my God, now what?

[He grasps her hand]
We go on three. One! Two!
I can't! You go, save yourself!

[He grabs her head and kisses her]
I'm sorry.
For kissing me?
No. For this.
[He throws her over the side and jumps after her]
What's that you're taking?
Xanax. My doctor prescribed them for situations of tension, and I think this qualifies.
Give me a couple.
You just drive.
[Quinn and Robin come across an old plane that crashed on the island]
This is not a good island for airplanes.
You still look good.
I still AM good.
[Robin and Quinn are sailing at the inflatable boat]
So what's the deal with you and... uhm...
[Robin draws breasts in the air]
Angelica.
Yeah.
No deal. We're friends. She works at the hotel couple of months a year, we have some laughs... keep it simple.
Well, has it always been... simple, or has there ever been anyone complicated?
[Quinn gives Robin a nasty look]
That's a yes. Yes? How complicated? Scale from one to ten.
Twelve.
I've had just about as much vacation as I can stand.
You're here.
I decided my life is too simple, I wanna complicate the hell out of it.
Pirates? As in "arrrgh"?
[Quinn's hand is in Robin's shorts - to catch a water snake that swam inside]
I better not catch you smiling.
Do you want to stay here tonight?

[looks at bed]
Stay?
Yeah, with me? I mean you probably think I'm being slutty or something, but you're feeling bad and I'm feeling bad, and I'd really like for you to stay.
I... I... I just don't
[she takes off her skirt]
Yeah!
Yeah, you know, I'm making conversation. Why?
You talk too much. You're opinionated. You're stubborn, sarcastic and stuck up! Your ass is too narrow and your tits are too small.
[pause]
Hey, you wanna know why you're not my type?
Nope.

[Grabs Radio]
Attention K-Mart shoppers. Snow-shovels are on sale for $ 12.99!
Well done Ocean. Well done sky.
Well done Mai Tais.

[Beautiful busty woman walks by]
Well done Silicone.
It's like after a funeral, everybody has sex.
[Waking up in Angelica's bed]
Oh no. What did I do? And how many times did I do it?
I want this to be the most unforgettable vacation of our lives.

[Despairing because Robin is missing]
God I loved her... *love*... her.
Not to insult you, but I don't think guys know what love is.
I do!
Yeah? Guys are always telling me that they love me.
Well, I'm sure at least some of them mean it.

[Chuckles scoffingly]
No they don't.
